thread.title: Chinese New Year greeting by Trump’s granddaughter sparks huge media interest
thread.title_full: Chinese New Year greeting by Trump’s granddaughter sparks huge media interest

title: Chinese New Year greeting by Trump’s granddaughter sparks huge media interest
text: dia interest – both in China and the United States, mainland media reported. ’s song called “Happy New Year” while carrying a Chinese lion dance puppet in the video posted on Twitter on Thursday by her mother, Ivanka Trump, the tabloid newspaper Global Times reported. Arabella singing a song she learned for #ChineseNewYear,” Ivanka Trump wrote in a caption accompanying the 37-second-long video. Wishing everyone an amazing year to come during these days of celebration.” “Happy New Year!” – unlike his predecessors – has not sent any new year’s greeting on the official White House website. ’s Twitter account during last year’s holiday. ’s relationship with China has been tense since his election campaign after he called the country a “currency manipulator” in his campaign pledge on trade. One comment by a reader on the mainland news website news.163.com, who watched Arabella singing in the latest video, said: “Cute girl, good singing. Pure children do not have conspiracies.” However, other netizens were not happy that the US President had not sent any personal Lunar New Year greeting, saying: “He is just trying to brush us off with this five year old girl.” - SCMP
